regen.absent_element: procedure for driver in cab where call fails to notify lead driver of failure
regen.new_specification: The system shall enable the driver in a cab where the call fails to automatically send a notification to the lead driver, prompting reestablishment of the call.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
